title: [Medicine] Older organs accelerate aging in transplant recipients: young and middle-aged mice that received heart transplants from older mice had impaired physical capacity, reduced running times and grip strengths. Middle-aged mice who received older hearts also showed impaired memory and poorer learning.

[Medicine] Spouses or partners in heterosexual relationships may have high blood pressure that mirrors one another, finds new, multinational study. Many married couples often have the same interests, living environment, lifestyle habits and health outcomes.
